name: Cotswolds One Day Discoverer
description:
COTSWOLDS DISCOVERER Unlimited travel for one day with weekday time restrictions between Moreton-in-Marsh and Oxford; between Ashchurch for Tewkesbury and Yate; and between 
      Gloucester and Swindon via Stroud - these lines are obviously not all connected. The ticket is also valid and can be bought from "Johnsonâs Excelbus" and "Stagecoach" buses within the Cotswolds Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty which connects 
      the two separate rail lines. The area extends as far north as Stratford-upon-Avon but only by bus.
